amendment.description: To aid human trafficking victims' recovery and rehabilitation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 303 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 303 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Shaheen. (consideration: CR S2333-2337; text: CR S2336) To aid human trafficking victims' recovery and rehabilitation.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 303 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Shaheen.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 303 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
